Name: NEON STRUCT: Desperation Column
About the game: Blast your way to the top of the tower and take down the megacorp! NEON STRUCT: Desperation Column is a minimalist roguelite FPS, created for the 7dfps 2021 game jam. Shoot or sneak past security drones! Manage your health and ammo! It's limited! Chase corporate executives! And steal their keycards! Laugh in the face of death itself as you try, try again! Marvel at the coolest graphics of 1992! Ascend to the top floor and shut it all down! It's free and takes about 15 minutes to play.
